title: How to Do the Fence Glitch in Resident Evil 4 (Gamecube Version Only)

steps.headline: Get to the farm in the village.
Go to a certain fence that has a lump of dirt on the other side.
Go to the fence (on the other side with no lump of dirt, and by the way there are some cows right next to the fence) to the very end until it stops saying "JUMP OVER".
Step back one step and wait until it says "JUMP OVER".
Jump over it and you should be in the lump of dirt.
steps.description: This is in the corner of the fence and the tall fence.

steps.headline: Walk through the lump of dirt through the tall fence and you will be out of bounds.
Walk in midair.
steps.description: Go on the inside where Leon is not out of bounds. You should be floating in midair not very high though.

steps.headline: Go higher than usual.
steps.description: There is a tree that is on the side of a building (where one of the blue medallions are hanging on the chandeliers above you) that is out of bounds, walk into it and you should be going higher.

text: Get to the farm in the village.  Go to a certain fence that has a lump of dirt on the other side.  Go to the fence (on the other side with no lump of dirt, and by the way there are some cows right next to the fence) to the very end until it stops saying "JUMP OVER".  Step back one step and wait until it says "JUMP OVER".  Jump over it and you should be in the lump of dirt. This is in the corner of the fence and the tall fence. Walk through the lump of dirt through the tall fence and you will be out of bounds.  Walk in midair. Go on the inside where Leon is not out of bounds. You should be floating in midair not very high though. Go higher than usual. There is a tree that is on the side of a building (where one of the blue medallions are hanging on the chandeliers above you) that is out of bounds, walk into it and you should be going higher.
